pages.text: Finding to carry all those guides tedious?$(br)Then the $(item)akashic tome$() is for you!$(br2)You got one at your first login and it can store any other book you like, even enchanted ones!

Use it, to read the book you like. It also works in crafting recipes and other actions.$(br2)Punch it into empty air, to make it return into it's normal form.$(br2)TO add books, just craft it with another book.

pages.title: Akashic tome
pages.text: In case you lost your copy
If you want to remove a book, select it, then sneak and press $(thing)$(k:drop)$(), to pop it out.
